chapters.title: Chapter 10: The Use of Dragons
chapters.info: First Captain Gerard Arganda, p. 229—Short, compact First Captain of Queen Alliandre's guards. He is a tough man; he worked his way up from the bottom to be where he is. He disliked Perrin for some time for taking his Queen where she could be kidnapped. He insisted that the Ghealdanins get treatment equal to the Mayeners. He has since learned great respect for Perrin, and commands men under him. He likes to argue with Gallenne. See also Kigarin, Alliandre Maritha.
